header.xliffext:poisonError: Handback file name: lo-mt_bc36610.3127a66bb0ba09552eced321c4f3b4501d5b9e75.zh-cn is different with handoff file name: bc36610.3127a66bb0ba09552eced321c4f3b4501d5b9e75.zh-cn.

trans-unit.source: Name '<name>' is either not declared or not in the current scope | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 名称 '<名称>未声明或不在当前范围内 |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: Name '<name>' is either not declared or not in the current scope
trans-unit.target: 名称 '<名称>未声明或不在当前范围内

trans-unit.source: A LINQ query refers to a programming element, but the compiler cannot find an element that has that exact name.
trans-unit.target: LINQ 查询引用一个编程元素，但编译器无法找到具有相同名称的元素。

trans-unit.source: Check the spelling of the name in the referring statement.
trans-unit.target: 检查引用语句中名称的拼写。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] is case-insensitive, but any other variation in the spelling constitutes a different name.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]不区分大小写，但拼写中的任何其他变体构成不同的名称。

trans-unit.source: Note that the underscore (`_`) is part of the name and therefore part of the spelling.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，下划线 (`_`) 是名称的一部分，因此也是拼写的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Verify that the programming element is in scope.
trans-unit.target: 验证编程元素是否在作用域范围中。

trans-unit.source: If the referring statement is outside the region declaring the programming element, you might have to qualify the element name.
trans-unit.target: 如果引用语句位于声明编程元素的区域外，则可能需要限定元素名称。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Scope in Visual Basic](../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/scope.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Visual Basic 中的作用域](../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/scope.md)。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that you have the member access operator (`.`) between an object and its member.
trans-unit.target: 确保对象及其成员之间具有成员访问运算符 (`.`)。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control named `TextBox1`, to access its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> property you should type `TextBox1.Text`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件名为`TextBox1`，以访问其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>属性应键入`TextBox1.Text`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If instead you type `TextBox1Text`, you have created a different name.
trans-unit.target: 如果你转而键入 `TextBox1Text`，则会创建不同的名称。
[在 Visual Basic 中的 LINQ 简介](../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/linq/introduction-to-linq.md)
